name: GMTK JAM 2021 - JOINING JELLIES
description:
Stop the enemy jellies from joining together, clear all the waves, and claim a prize at the end!

Left Click - Pick up

Right Click - Fire

A 48 hour game jam game for the GMTK 2021

The theme was "Joined together" I used this by making the enemies join together

****Known bug- Very rarely the items wont be picked up and they player will be stuck. Didnt have time to fix this
